"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Észak-Amerika</string>
            <string language="en">North-America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Norden-Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nord-america</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Norte-América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Nord-America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βόρεια Αμερική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Norte-Ame'rica</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Észak-Amerika indián kultúrái</string>
            <string language="en">North-America</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Az Európán kívüli világ,  eszkimó,  sziú,  apacs,  irokéz,  </string>
            <string language="en">The world beyond Europe, Eskimo, Siou, Apache, Iroquese</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Norden-Amerika</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nord-america</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Norte-América</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Nord-America</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βόρεια Αμερική</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Norte-Ame'rica</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Welt über Europa, Eskimo, Siou, Apache, Iroquese 
hinaus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le monde au delà de l'Europe, Esquimau, Siou, 
Apache, Iroquese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O mundo além de Europa, esquimó, Siou, Apache, 
Iroquese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mondo oltre Europa, eschimese, Siou, Apache, 
Iroquese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κόσμος πέρα από την Ευρώπη, Εσκιμώος, Siou, Apache,
Iroquese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El mundo más allá de Europa, esquimal, Siou, Apache, 
Iroquese</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>

            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>

        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
